General.Name: Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited engages in the solar and wind power generation, and printing and packaging businesses in Thailand, Japan, Hong Kong, and Vietnam. The company is also involved in the maintenance and installation service contract in solar power project; and installation of rooftop solar system. In addition, it invests in and develops energy projects. The company was formerly known as Eastern Printing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited in April 2020. Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
